gears.name: Watering Can
gears.use: Speeds up crop growth

gears.name: Trowel
gears.use: Realign crops

gears.name: Recall Wrench
gears.use: Teleports the user to the Gear Shop

gears.name: Basic Sprinkler
gears.use: Increases growth speed and harvest size of crops within its radius

gears.name: Firework
gears.use: Launches a firework into the sky

gears.name: Advanced Sprinkler
gears.use: Increases growth speed and mutation chance of crops within its radius

gears.name: Star Caller
gears.use: Redirects shooting stars to land in its close vicinity

gears.name: Night Staff
gears.use: Guarantees the moonlit mutation of 6 random plants in the user's garden

gears.name: Godly Sprinkler
gears.use: Increases growth speed, mutation chance and harvest size of crops within its radius

gears.name: Chocolate Sprinkler
gears.use: Multi-harvest fruit within its area of effect are covered in chocolate

gears.name: Magnifying Glass
gears.use: Inspects plants to reveal the value without collecting them

gears.name: Nectar Staff
gears.use: Attracts more bees to pollinate the players fruit in their garden

gears.name: Pollen Radar
gears.use: Scans and collects nearby pollinated fruit

gears.name: Master Sprinkler
gears.use: Greatly increases growth speed, mutation chance and harvest size of crops within its radius

gears.name: Cleaning Spray
gears.use: Removes all mutations from the selected crop

gears.name: Favorite Tool
gears.use: Prevents selected crops from being picked up by the user

gears.name: Harvest Tool
gears.use: Harvests all fruit from the selected plant

gears.name: Friendship Pot
gears.use: A flower pot to share with a friend

gears.name: Honey Sprinkler
gears.use: Applies the Honey Glazed mutation to crops within its radius

gears.name: Lightning Rod

price.craftingMaterials: 1x Basic Sprinkler + 1x Advanced Sprinkler + 1x Godly Sprinkler

gears.use: Redirects lightning strikes from its vicinity to exact position in the user's garden

gears.name: Berry Blusher Sprinkler
gears.use: Greatly increases the size bonus for Grapes, Blueberries, Strawberries, Raspberries and Celestiberries. Lasts 1.5 minutes

gears.name: Flower Froster Sprinkler

price.craftingMaterials: 1x Orange Tulip + 1x Daffodil + 1x Advanced Sprinkler + 1x Basic Sprinkler

gears.use: Freezes Flower type plants. Lasts for 2.5 minutes

gears.name: Spice Spritzer Sprinkler

price.craftingMaterials: 1x Pepper + 1x Ember Lily + 1x Cacao + 1x Master Sprinkler

gears.use: Greatly increase variant chance for Cacao, Pepper and Papaya. Lasts 2.5 minutes

gears.name: Stalk Sprout Sprinkler
gears.use: Greatly increases the growth speed of Mushrooms, Bamboo, and Beanstalk and can also make them get the wet mutation. Lasts 2 minutes

gears.name: Sweet Soaker Sprinkler
gears.use: Increases size bonus for Watermelon, Pumpkin, and Moon Melon. Lasts 5 minutes

gears.name: Tropical Mist Sprinkler

price.craftingMaterials: 1x Coconut + 1x Dragon Fruit + 1x Mango + 1x Godly Sprinkler

gears.use: Increases growth speed and size bonus for tropical fruits, lasts 4 minutes

gears.name: Reclaimer
gears.use: Reclaims plants, turning them into seeds. 3 use
